title: UX Design
description: UX design tools and user research resources. Learn about user testing, journey mapping, wireframing, and creating user-centered designs. Essential resources for understanding user behavior and designing better experiences. Build products users love.

resources.title: Filters vs. Facets: Definitions
resources.description: The terms “filters” and “faceted navigation” are often used interchangeably; although related, these concepts have important differences.

resources.title: Task Analysis: Support Users in Achieving Their Goals
resources.description: Task analysis is the systematic study of how users complete tasks to achieve their goals.
